channel.title: üè¢ Tencent AI Lab on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Tencent AI Lab on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Draft Model Knows When to Stop: A Self-Verification Length Policy for Speculative Decoding
item.description: Self-VerIfication length Policy (SVIP) dynamically adjusts speculative decoding draft lengths based on token difficulty, achieving up to 20% faster large language model inference.

item.title: AnchorCrafter: Animate CyberAnchors Saling Your Products via Human-Object Interacting Video Generation
item.description: AnchorCrafter animates cyber-anchors selling products via human-object interacting video generation, achieving high visual fidelity and controllable interactions.

item.title: Low-Bit Quantization Favors Undertrained LLMs: Scaling Laws for Quantized LLMs with 100T Training Tokens
item.description: Low-bit quantization excels for undertrained LLMs but struggles with fully-trained ones; new scaling laws reveal this, directing future research.

item.title: Insight-V: Exploring Long-Chain Visual Reasoning with Multimodal Large Language Models
item.description: Insight-V: A multi-agent system enhances multi-modal LLMs’ visual reasoning by generating high-quality long-chain reasoning data and employing a two-stage training pipeline, achieving significant perf…

item.title: StdGEN: Semantic-Decomposed 3D Character Generation from Single Images
item.description: StdGEN: Generate high-quality, semantically decomposed 3D characters from a single image in minutes, enabling flexible customization for various applications.

item.title: Hunyuan-Large: An Open-Source MoE Model with 52 Billion Activated Parameters by Tencent
item.description: Tencent unveils Hunyuan-Large, a groundbreaking open-source MoE LLM boasting 389B parameters and 52B activated parameters, surpassing existing models in performance across various benchmarks.
